abstracts.cdata!:
This Aide Memoire on the Rural Water
            Supply and Sanitation Project of Nicaragua noted that a
            World Bank mission visit Nicaragua between the 21 and March
            28, 201 4 in order to supervise the execution of the Rural
            Water and Sanitation Project (PRASNICA). This memory aid
            summarizes the main discussions and agreements reached, as
            well as the recommendations issued by the mission. This aide
            memoire is to be disclosed publicly once the mission is completed.
